DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Of GSK189075 Taken By Mouth Containing Small Amounts Of Radioactivity Studied In Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Are healthy , nonsmoking male . Are 30 55 year old , inclusive . Have Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1930 kg/m2 , inclusive ; body weight > 110 lb . Have history regular bowel movement ( least 4 time per week ) . Are willing able provide write informed consent start studyrelated procedure . Have significant laboratory abnormality history liver kidney disease . Have significant abnormality electrocardiogram ( ECG ) recording heart rhythm . Have current condition ( ) alters normal gastrointestinal ( GI ) function ( constipation removal gallbladder ) . Have illness require treatment physician 30 day screen fever illness 5 day dose . Have blood pressure outside normal range . Have rest pulse rate outside normal range . Have surgery within 3 month screen , unless approve GSK medical monitor . Have drug allergy investigator feel would make unsafe participate study . Have history current abuse alcohol . Have history current use illicit drug , positive drug screen . Have use tobacco product within 3 month prior screen positive cotinine test result . Are unable refrain food beverages contain coffee , tea , chocolate 72 hour dose study drug 24 hour dose . Have positive test human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody hepatitis B surface antigen hepatitis C antibody . Have take prescription nonprescription drug , include vitamin , herbal product , plantderived supplement ( include St John 's Wort ) within 14 day ( less 5 halflives ) first dose study medication , unless approve GSK medical monitor Have participate investigational drug study within 30 day screen , participate within last 12 month study another radio label drug product . Have total radiation exposure previous 3year period 10 mSv ( either work participation research study ) . Clinical ( therapeutic diagnostic ) exposure include . Have donate blood ( 450 mL ) within previous 12 week . Are occupation require monitor radiation exposure , nuclear medicine procedure excessive xrays within past 12 month . Are able follow study direction .
